entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Onefour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:44 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow mixed with freezing rain this morning. Fog dissipating late this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 08:40 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 08:40 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow beginning late in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 08:40 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
